info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 6 at 9:16AM CDT until June 7 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County.
Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County.
For the Current River...including Powder Mill...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Jacks Fork River...including Alley Spring...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Jacks Fork at Alley Spring.
* WHEN...From Saturday morning to Saturday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, water impacts Alley Spring Campground. Water is one foot in depth at the 600, 800 and 900 loop camp sites.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 9.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 930 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON
